Headline: #82 Kimball-Homan Temporary Reroute at Kimball/Diversey
ShortDescription: 82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Kimball, Diversey, Kedzie, Belmont, and Kimball due to, street blockage at Kimball/Diversey.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Kimball, Diversey, Kedzie, Belmont, and Kimball due to, street blockage at Kimball/Diversey.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Rosemont
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Rosemont due to a mechanical problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Rosemont due to a mechanical problem.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
